pages.contact: AutoSpares India - Buy Genuine Auto Parts & Accessories Online | Contact Us Home Contact us Our advantages Who we are Our catalog +91-11-2392-9754 Let’s Talk Have any questions or need assistance with finding the right auto parts? Our friendly team is here to help. Simply fill out the form below, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible. I accept privacy policy Send message Quality Auto Parts You Can Trust At AutoSpares India, we understand the importance of using high-quality, reliable auto parts for your vehicle's maintenance and repair. That's why we've partnered with leading manufacturers and suppliers to bring you a wide range of genuine OEM and aftermarket parts for all vehicle makes and models. Our extensive inventory includes everything from engine components and brake systems to filters, batteries, and accessories. We meticulously inspect each product to ensure it meets the highest standards of quality and performance, so you can have peace of mind knowing that your vehicle is in good hands. Whether you're a professional mechanic or a DIY enthusiast, you can count on AutoSpares India to provide you with the auto parts you need at competitive prices. Our knowledgeable staff is always ready to assist you in finding the right parts for your vehicle, ensuring a hassle-free shopping experience. FAQ What types of auto parts do you offer? We offer a wide range of auto parts, including engine components, brake systems, filters, batteries, lighting, body parts, and more. Our inventory covers both OEM and aftermarket parts for all vehicle makes and models. Do you offer genuine or aftermarket parts? We offer both genuine OEM parts from the original manufacturers and high-quality aftermarket parts from reputable brands. You can choose the option that best suits your needs and budget. How can I ensure I get the right parts for my vehicle? You can provide us with your vehicle's make, model, year, and VIN (Vehicle Identification Number) to ensure we recommend the correct parts for your specific vehicle. Do you offer any warranties on the auto parts you sell? Yes, we offer warranties on many of the auto parts we sell. The warranty coverage varies depending on the part and the manufacturer. You can find the warranty information for each product on its respective page. Can I return or exchange auto parts if they don't fit or if I changed my mind? We accept returns and exchanges for most auto parts within a certain period, provided they are unused and in their original packaging. Please refer to our returns and exchange policy for more details. How long does it take for my order to be delivered? Delivery times vary depending on your location and the shipping method you choose. Most orders are delivered within 3-7 business days, but you can check the estimated delivery date during the checkout process. Do you offer any discounts or promotions? Yes, we frequently offer discounts, promotional codes, and special offers on various auto parts and accessories. Be sure to check our website or sign up for our newsletter to stay informed about the latest deals. Can I place an order over the phone or via email? Certainly! In addition to our online store, you can place orders by calling our customer service hotline or by sending an email to our sales team. Our representatives will be happy to assist you with your order. Do you offer any installation services? While we do not offer installation services directly, we can recommend reliable and trustworthy auto repair shops or mechanics in your area who can assist with the installation of the parts you purchase from us. How can I track the status of my order? Once your order is shipped, you will receive a tracking number that you can use to monitor the progress of your delivery. You can track your order directly on our website or through the carrier's website using the provided tracking number. Business Hours Monday 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM Tuesday 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM Wednesday 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM Thursday 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM Friday 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM Saturday 9:00 AM - 2:00 PM Sunday Closed Our extensive range of high-quality auto parts and accessories, coupled with our commitment to excellent customer service, ensures that you can trust us for all your vehicle maintenance and repair requirements. pages.privacy: AutoSpares India - Buy Genuine Auto Parts & Accessories Online | Privacy Policy Home Contact us Our advantages Who we are Our catalog +91-11-2392-9754 Privacy Policy At AutoSpares India, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard the data you provide to us. Information We Collect We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, shipping address, and payment details when you place an order or sign up for our newsletter. We also collect non-personal information, such as your IP address and browser type, for analytical purposes. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect to process your orders, provide customer support, send you marketing communications (if you've opted in), and improve our website and services. We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. Data Security We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse. However, no data transmission over the internet or electronic storage method is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. Cookies and Tracking Technologies We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze website traffic, and deliver targeted advertisements. You can adjust your browser settings to decline cookies if you prefer. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of those websites, and we encourage you to review their respective privacy policies. Children's Privacy Our website is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children without parental consent. Changes to This Policy We reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting the revised policy on our website. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at autosparesindia@gmail.com. Our extensive range of high-quality auto parts and accessories, coupled with our commitment to excellent customer service, ensures that you can trust us for all your vehicle maintenance and repair requirements.
